sn11.7:1.4: It seems that even when on retreat, Sakka was thinking of Vepacitti, and Vepacitti was thinking of Sakka.
sn11.7:4.1: Despite their differences, both sides in a dispute respect morality and each other.
sn11.7:4.6: Vepacitti is reminding Sakka of their family connection. His wife is the Asura maiden Sujā (SN 11.12:6.1), hence the titans are his brothers (DN 20:12.3).
